duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect and maintain utility infrastructure, respond to main breaks or backups, and repair utilities infrastructure.
Receive instruction and training in the operation, servicing, and maintenance of water booster stations and wastewater lift stations.
Support other Divisions in Public Works such as working as a plow driver for Streets’ Snow and Ice Operations.
Perform manual labor, including heavy lifting and digging, for extended periods of time under all weather conditions.

education_certification.credential: Valid driver’s license and safe driving record
Within 6 months of employment, must obtain a valid Commercial Driver’s License Class B (must be maintained for continued employment)
